About Umm Al Quwain Free Zone

Start your business in the fastest-growing business hub in the MENA region.

Umm Al Quwain free zone or UAQ free zone is a progressive business setup space that favors corporates, micro-businesses, and SMEs with unlimited advantages. UAQ FTZ was established in 1987 but gained recognition following a restructuring in 2014. The free zone is strategically located close to the highways connecting the Emirates and primary seaports of UAE such as Sharjah International Airport, and Dubai International Airport. The strategic location of the UAQ-free zone attracts companies of all sizes from over 150 nationalities.
UAQ FTZ has a transparent and advanced legal framework with a low cost of living, an open investment climate, and easy access to trading partners in Asia and Africa. So, Umm Al Quwain is the right place for investor-friendly entrepreneurs. The free zone offers generous investment incentives for startups, micro-businesses, and SMEs.
At UAQ FTZ, entrepreneurs enjoy a progressive business environment regardless of the industry sectors. The free zone prioritizes investors in all the actions, it makes UAQ the most sought-after business hub in the MENA region. Willing to set up a new business or expand into new markets, UAQ finds ways to accomplish your business dreams. Foster your business in a safe and secure environment.

Freezone Locations

  • JAFZA
  • DMCC

  • Sharjah Media City
  • Sharjah Publishing City

  • JAFZA

Why UAQ Free Zone? - The Benefits of business setup in UAQ

Strategic Location

Umm Al Quwain’s strategic location on the eastern coast of the UAE makes it an ideal base for businesses looking to tap into the markets of Middle East, Africa, and Asia. Situated close to major transportation hubs and international airports, businesses can easily connect with global markets and establish a strong foothold in the region.

Business-Friendly Policies

Umm Al Quwain has built a reputation for its business-friendly policies and regulations. The emirate offers attractive incentives, including tax exemptions, full repatriation of capital and profits, and no currency restrictions.

Cost-Effective

The cost of setting up and operating a business in Umm Al Quwain is typically lower compared to other emirates in the UAE, making it an affordable choice for startups and small businesses.

Access to Talent

The emirate provides access to a skilled and diverse labor pool. The government has also implemented initiatives to promote training and development programs, ensuring a skilled workforce for businesses.

Infrastructure and Facilities

Umm Al Quwain has developed a robust infrastructure and supports state-of-the-art facilities to cater to the needs of businesses across various sectors.

UAQ Free Zone - Types of licenses

A license is essential to start a business in the Umm Al Quwain free zone. The license confirms the nature of your business and its legitimacy. So, categorize your business and apply for the license.

Commercial License

Commercial licenses allow entrepreneurs to indulge in import, export, distribution, or even storing items. The license authorizes companies to trade different products based on the approved commercial activities. The entrepreneurs can choose any additional facilities such as a warehouse, co-working space, and standard office as per their requirements. Some of the popular commercial activities are Food & Beverages, automobiles, construction, chemicals, medical equipment, jewelry, electronics, furniture, computers, and much more.
E-commerce licenses allow business owners to trade a wide range of permitted products through online marketplaces such as Noon, Amazon, etc., and social media accounts.

General trading license

A general trading license allows business owners to trade any product permitted in the UAE. Few products require special clearance or approvals from the government authorities. These products cannot be traded with a general trading license. The general trading license has several advantages such as no corporate & personal income tax, no limitation on profit repatriation, and finally no import & export tax.

Service license

Service license allows entrepreneurs to carry out specific services within the Freezone. The service license allows you to practice any profession or applies to people who give professional advice. It’s issued for artisans, professionals, craftsmen, and service providers. UAQ allows companies to select two services according to their business needs. A few services include consulting, staffing, insurance services, courier services, tour services, travel services, car rental, and more.

Freelance Permit

Freelance permits allow individuals to operate as individual professionals or conduct businesses in their birth name. The freelance license is aimed at driving individuals from the media, technology, TV, and film sectors. The freelance license is expected to meet creative roles, creative roles, and selected admin roles to improve the talent pool of the UAQ creative industry. By choosing an affordable freelance license, the client becomes a registered freelancer who carries out their profession with necessary legal support.

Industrial license

An industrial license is essential to start a manufacturing company that includes importing raw materials, manufacturing, processing, assembling, packaging, and finally, exporting the final product. The processed products can be exported outside the UAE or if you wish to sell within the UAE market, you need to do this with a local agent or local distributor.

Best facilities for business setup in Umm Al Quwain free zone

UAQ free zone is a thriving destination for entrepreneurs, global corporates, and start-ups. The favorable tax laws and secure living environment ensure speedy development and easy access to global markets.

The financial benefits,

  • Free from currency restrictions
  • No personal tax or corporate tax
  • Complete repatriation of profit and capital
  • Complete ownership of the company
  • Free from import and export tax
The attractive facilities include,
  • Investor-friendly process with excellent customer support
  • No physical presence - remote business setup
  • Infrastructure that meets the future needs of your business
  • Strategically located to connect with the global markets
  • Logistics support
  • Highly-versatile business environment
  • Dual licensing - allows entrepreneurs to conduct multiple operations

Start your business at UAQ

UAQ Free Zone’s strategic location, business-friendly policies, and supportive ecosystem make it an enticing destination for entrepreneurs and businesses seeking an opportunity to set up their presence in the UAE. By taking advantage of the streamlined business setup process and the attractive incentives offered, businesses can pave their way toward success and growth in Umm Al Quwain.
